page.title: 15Braintree's Traffic System
page.content: The one way system has many advantages and a few disadvantages. The advantages of this system are that traffic jams in the centre of the town are reduced as traffic flowing from the east runs around the south side of the town while vehicles from the west continue along the A.120 rejoining the east bound vehicles on the outskirts of the town. The disadvantage is that narrow roads slow the wide heavy vehicles, to a crawl especially at the crossroads by the White Hart Hotel. This corner has been the cause of many accidents as long wheelbase vehicles cannot negotiate the tight bend. A second problem is caused on Market days when traffic is funnelled though the narrow streets and delays, due to the number of vehicles, build up.
